transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON. P. J . KEATING MP
transcript.content:
.4
A
PRIME MINISTER
STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON. P. J. KEATING MP
HEWSON " RESPONSE"
Dr Hewson stands alone as the only person in Australia who
thinks the Government should do nothing about the recession.
Tonight he said the Government should not spend one cent to
get the economy moving.
His response to the One Nation plan for the future was
nothing more than a litany of reasons why Australia could
not succeed.
Labor believes Australia can succeed.
CANBERRA February 27 1992 20/ 92
